content:
Is there a reason why there are no codes here http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-message-events.html
or here https://www.hl7.org/fhir/codesystem-message-events.html
but they are here
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/codesystem-message-events.html
We yanked them all on the grounds that no thought had gone into them
well that makes sense but now it just looks like an omission. It says it is normative.
Yeah. However, as a normative extensible empty value set, it's actually meaningless. Can you submit a change request?
I think there's already a change to request to mark them as not-normative
I couldn't find that so have raised FHIR#26902
